level.heading: Detention of United States prisoners in Washington Asylum and Jail.
level.text: The Department of Corrections is hereby authorized and directed to receive and keep in the Washington Asylum and Jail all prisoners committed thereto for offenses against the United States.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: "Department of Corrections" was substituted for "Board of Public Welfare" pursuant to ยง 24-211.03.
